Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This unique item carries a significant value to us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. We're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18000, believing that its quality and uniqueness justify this investment. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. We're confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or business. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
